color-heading.description: Configures the color used for headings

background-color-neutral.description: Default background color for all page  layouts

border-radius-none.description: Border radius none. Fixed to be 0 to reflect no border-radius (read-only)

border-radius-circle.description: Border radius circle. Fixed to be 50% as it reflects all components with circle styling (read-only)

border-radius-xs.description: Border radius with exta small modifier. Defaults to 25% of the $border-radius.

border-radius-sm.description: Border radius with small modifier. Defaults to 50% of the $border-radius

border-radius-md.description: Border radius with medium modifier. Defaults to 100% of $border-radius

border-radius-lg.description: Border radius with large modifier. Defaults to a round border

border-radius-pill.description: Border radius with a pill modifier. Defaults to 20 * $border-radius

border-radius-enabled.description: Global toggle to enable rounded corners (experimental)

box-shadow-sm-offset-x.description:
Configures the horizontal position of Small shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-sm

box-shadow-sm-offset-y.description:
Configures the vertical position of Small shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-sm

box-shadow-sm-blur-radius.description:
Configures the blur radius for Small shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-sm

box-shadow-sm-spread-radius.description:
Configures the spread radius for Small shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-sm

box-shadow-sm-color.description:
Configures the color for Small shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-sm

box-shadow-sm.description:
Small shadow (read-only)
Composed of the separate shadow properties: offset-x, offset-y, blur-radius, spread-radius and color

box-shadow-md-offset-x.description:
Configures the horizontal position of Medium shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-md

box-shadow-md-offset-y.description:
Configures the vertical position of Medium shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-md

box-shadow-md-blur-radius.description:
Configures the blur radius for Medium shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-md

box-shadow-md-spread-radius.description:
Configures the spread radius for Medium shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-md

box-shadow-md-color.description:
Configures the color for Medium shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-md

box-shadow-md.description:
Medium shadow - the default for shadows (read-only)
Composed of the separate shadow properties: offset-x, offset-y, blur-radius, spread-radius and color

box-shadow-lg-offset-x.description:
Configures the horizontal position of Large shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-lg

box-shadow-lg-offset-y.description:
Configures the vertical position of Large shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-lg

box-shadow-lg-blur-radius.description:
Configures the blur radius for Large shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-lg

box-shadow-lg-spread-radius.description:
Configures the spread radius for Large shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-lg

box-shadow-lg-color.description:
Configures the color for Large shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-lg

box-shadow-lg.description:
Large shadow (read-only)
Composed of the separate shadow properties: offset-x, offset-y, blur-radius, spread-radius and color

box-shadow-xl-offset-x.description:
Configures the horizontal position of Exta Large shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-xl

box-shadow-xl-offset-y.description:
Configures the vertical position of Exta Large shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-xl

box-shadow-xl-blur-radius.description:
Configures the blur radius for Exta Large shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-xl

box-shadow-xl-spread-radius.description:
Configures the spread radius for Exta Large shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-xl

box-shadow-xl-color.description:
Configures the color for Exta Large shadows
Used to compose $box-shadow-xl

box-shadow-xl.description:
Exta Large shadow (read-only)
Composed of the separate shadow properties: offset-x, offset-y, blur-radius, spread-radius and color

chart-color-1.description: Configures additional palette color 1: Used in the custom icon colors and part of the data-visualisation palette

chart-color-2.description: Configures additional palette color 2: Used in the custom icon colors and part of the data-visualisation palette

chart-color-3.description: Configures additional palette color 3: Used in the custom icon colors and part of the data-visualisation palette

chart-color-4.description: Configures additional palette color 4: Used in the custom icon colors and part of the data-visualisation palette

chart-color-5.description: Configures additional palette color 5: Used in the custom icon colors and part of the data-visualisation palette

chart-color-6.description: Configures additional palette color 6: Used in the custom icon colors and part of the data-visualisation palette

chart-color-7.description: Configures additional palette color 7: Used in the custom icon colors and part of the data-visualisation palette

chart-color-8.description: Configures additional palette color 8: Used in the custom icon colors and part of the data-visualisation palette

chart-color-9.description: Configures additional palette color 9: Used in the custom icon colors and part of the data-visualisation palette

chart-color-10.description: Configures additional palette color 10: Used in the custom icon colors and part of the data-visualisation palette

chart-primary-color.description: Configures the primary color used in the data-visualisation palette

chart-primary-light-color.description: Configures the primary light color used in the data-visualisation palette

chart-negative-color.description: Configures the color used for negative amounts in data-visualisation

chart-negative-light-color.description: Configures the negative light color used in the data-visualisation palette

chart-positive-color.description: Configures the color used for positive amounts in data-visualisation

chart-secondary-color.description: Configures the secondary color used in data-visualisation

chart-neutral-color.description: Configures the neutral color used in data-visualisation

chart-neutral-grey-color.description: Configures the neutral grey color used in data-visualisation

chart-alert-color.description: Configures the alert color used in data-visualisation. By default a slightly lighter calculation of $chart-negative-color

color-primary.description:
Configures the brand primary color
Used to calculate lighter and darker shade variables

color-secondary.description:
Configures the brand secondary color
Used to calculate lighter and darker shade variables

color-accent.description:
Configures the brand accent color
Used to calculate lighter and darker shade variables

color-success.description:
Configures the semantic success color
Used to calculate lighter and darker shade variables

color-danger.description:
Configures the semantic danger color
Used to calculate lighter and darker shade variables

color-warning.description:
Configures the semantic warning color
Used to calculate lighter and darker shade variables

color-info.description:
Configures the semantic info color
Used to calculate lighter and darker shade variables

color-neutral-greyer.description: Configures the darker grey neutral color

color-neutral-greyest.description: Configures the darkest grey neutral color

motion-delay-slow.description: Configures the delay in seconds for slow motions (experimental)

motion-delay-default.description: Configures the default delay in seconds motions (experimental)

motion-delay-fast.description: Configures the delay in seconds for fast motions (experimental)

motion-duration-slow.description: Configures the duration in seconds for slow motions (experimental)

motion-duration-default.description: Configures the default duration in seconds for motions (experimental)

motion-duration-fast.description: Configures the duration in seconds for fast motions (experimental)

motion-timing-ease-in.description: Configures the ease-in timing used for motions (experimental)

motion-timing-ease-out.description: Configures the ease-out timing used for motions (experimental)

motion-timing-ease-in-out.description: Configures the ease-in-out timing used for motions (experimental)

path-assets.description: Configures a custom assets path. Defaults to the preset assets folder

path-fonts.description: Configures a custom fonts path. Defaults to the preset $assets/fonts folder

path-images.description: Configures a custom assets path. Defaults to the preset $assets/fonts folder

sizer.description: Configures default padding used globally as sizer. This is used to calculate different sizers (xs, sm, md, lg, xl, xxl)

sizer-xs.description: Extra Small padding (read-only). Is calculated as 25% of the default $sizer

sizer-sm.description:
Small padding (read-only). Is calculated as 50% of the default $sizer
For example, used for vertical button padding

sizer-md.description:
Medium padding (read-only). Is calculated as 50% of the default $sizer
For example, used for horizontal button padding

sizer-xl.description:
Extra Large padding (read-only). Is calculated as 2 * $sizer
 For example, used in the login widget

sizer-xxl.description:
Exta Extra Large padding (read-only). Is calculated as 2.5 * $sizer
For example, used in the empty/error state container

spacer.description: Configures default margin used globally as spacer. This is used to calculate different spacers (xs, sm, md, lg, xl)

spacer-xs.description: Extra Small margin used globally (read-only). Is calculated as 25% of the default $spacer

spacer-sm.description: Small margin used globally (read-only). Is calculated as 50% of the default $spacer

spacer-md.description: Medium margin (read-only). For example, used for margin between buttons.. Defaults to $spacer

spacer-xl.description:
Extra Large padding (read-only). Is calculated as 2 * $spacer
For example, used as distance between widgets

font-family-heading.description: Configures the font used for headings. Defaults to $font-family

font-size-base.description:
Configures the font size base. NOTE: Use relative sizing like rem. This ensures user-specific settings, which create an accessible experience
Browser default of 1rem is typically 16px

font-size-hero.description: Configures the font size used by the Hero font

font-size-h1.description: Configures the font size used by page titles

font-size-h2.description: Configures the font size used by subsection titles

font-size-h3.description: Configures the font size used by sub-subsection titles

font-size-highlight.description: Configures the font size used for emphasizing amounts

font-size-default.description: Configures the font size used as default. Defaults to $font-size-base

font-size-subtitle.description: Configures the font size used for descriptions and secondary text

font-size-subheader.description: Configures the font size used for subheaders

font-size-table-default.description: Configures the font size used for table cells

font-size-table-header.description: Configures the font size used for table header cells

font-weight-heading.description: Configures the font-weight used for headings. Defaults to $font-weight-bold

line-height-heading.description: Configures the line-height used by headings

zindex-modal-backdrop.description: Z-index for the backdrop of modal components (read-only)

account-selector-height.description: Configures the (minimum) hight of the account-selector

account-selector-dropdown-max-height.description: Configures the maximum height of the account-selector drop-down list

account-selector-border-radius.description: Configures the border-radius of both the account-selector and the drop-down list

account-selector-box-shadow.description: Configures the shadow for both the account-selector and the drop-down list

account-selector-option-checked-backgrou.description: Configures the background-color for selected accounts in the account-selector drop-down list

account-selector-option-focus-background.description: Configures the background-color for focused accounts in the account-selector drop-down list

account-selector-option-separator-height.description: Configures the height of the separator-border between account-selector drop-down options

account-selector-dropdown-spacer.description: Configures the space between the account-selector and the drop-down list

account-selector-icon-background-color.description: Configures the background color of account-selector icons

account-selector-icon-color.description: Configures the icon color of account-selector icons

account-focus-border-primary.description: Configures the width style color of the border on focus (experimental)

account-focus-outline-distance.description: Configures the distance(top bottom left right) of the border from the element on focus (experimental)

button-box-shadow-offset-x.description:
Configures the button shadow offset-x
Used to compose $button-box-shadow

button-box-shadow-offset-y.description:
Configures the button shadow offset-y
Used to compose $button-box-shadow

button-box-shadow-blur-radius.description:
Configures the button shadow blur-radius
Used to compose $button-box-shadow

button-box-shadow-spread-radius.description:
Configures the button shadow spread-radius
Used to compose $button-box-shadow

button-box-shadow-color.description:
Configures the button shadow color
Used to compose $button-box-shadow

button-box-shadow.description:
Button shadow (read-only)
Composed of the separate shadow properties: offset-x, offset-y, blur-radius, spread-radius and color

button-active-box-shadow-offset-x.description:
Configures the button:active shadow offset-x
Used to compose $button-box-shadow

button-active-box-shadow-offset-y.description:
Configures the button:active shadow offset-y
Used to compose $button-box-shadow

button-active-box-shadow-blur-radius.description:
Configures the button:active shadow blur-radius
Used to compose $button-box-shadow

button-active-box-shadow-spread-radius.description:
Configures the button:active shadow spread-radius
Used to compose $button-box-shadow

button-active-box-shadow-color.description:
Configures the button:active shadow color
Used to compose $button-box-shadow

button-active-box-shadow.description:
Button:active shadow (read-only)
Composed of the separate shadow properties: offset-x, offset-y, blur-radius, spread-radius and color

button-color-transition.description:
Configures the button color-transition (experimental)
Used to configure the default $button-transition

button-background-color-transition.description:
Configures the button background-color-transition (experimental)
Used to configure the default $button-transition

button-border-color-transition.description:
Configures the button border-color-transition (experimental)
Used to configure the default  $button-transition

button-box-shadow-transition.description:
Configures the button shadow-transition (experimental)
Used to configure the default $button-transition

button-transition.description:
Configures all transitions used for button transitions (experimental)
Defaults to transitions with $button-color-transition, $button-background-color-transition, $button-border-color-transition and $button-box-shadow-transition

btn-focus-border-primary.description:
Configures the focus of the button  (experimental)
Used to configure when button is focused

btn-focus-outline-distance.description:
Configures the distance between button border and focus  outline  (experimental)
Used to configure when button is focused

btn-focus-border-radius-link-text.description:
Configures the border radius  (experimental)
Used to configure when button is focused

card-vendor-map.description:
Configures the card vendor images used by the card-vendor component
It uses a Sass map ([key: card-name]: ( image: [url-to-svg-card-image], width: [a number], height: [a number]))

empty-state-container-max-width.description: Configures the maximum width of the state container

empty-state-container-min-width.description: Configures the minimum width of the state container

empty-state-icon-color.description: Configures the color of the empty-state icon

empty-state-title-color.description: Configures the color of the empty-state title

empty-state-title-font-weight.description: Configures the font weight of the empty-state title

empty-state-title-font-size.description: Configures the font size of the empty-state title

empty-state-message-color.description: Configures the color of the empty-state message

empty-state-message-font-size.description: Configures the font size of the empty-state message

empty-state-message-font-weight.description: Configures the font weight of the empty-state message

icon-scale-sm.description: Configures the scale for Small icons

icon-scale-md.description: Default scale for Medium icons (read-only). To configure the global icon-size use $font-icon-size instead

icon-scale-lg.description: Configures the scale for Large icons

icon-scale-xl.description: Configures the scale for Extra Large icons

icon-scale-xxl.description: Configures the scale for Extra Extra Large icons

icon-scale-circle-sm.description: Configures the scale for Small round icons

icon-scale-circle-md.description: Configures the scale for Medium  round icons

icon-contrast-color.description: Configures the contrasting icon color for icons with a background-color

icon-square-border-radius.description: Configures the border-radius for square icons, has some roundness by default

font-icon-circle-size-sm.description:
Round icon size sm (read-only)
Composed of $font-icon-size * $icon-scale-circle-sm

font-icon-circle-size-md.description:
Round icon size md (read-only)
Composed of $font-icon-size * $icon-scale-circle-md

font-icon-background-size-sm.description:
Icon background size sm (read-only)
Composed of $font-icon-background-size * $icon-scale-sm

font-icon-background-size-md.description:
Icon background size md (read-only)
Composed of $font-icon-background-size * $icon-scale-md

font-icon-background-size-lg.description:
Icon background size lg (read-only)
Composed of $font-icon-background-size * $icon-scale-lg

font-icon-background-size-xl.description:
Icon background size xl (read-only)
Composed of $font-icon-background-size * $icon-scale-xl

font-icon-background-size-xxl.description:
Icon background size xxl (read-only)
Composed of $font-icon-background-size * $icon-scale-xxl

enable-outlined-icons.description:
Configures the toggle for outlining icons. Defaults to true
When false, it will use the original icon-map definitions

input-background-color.description: Configures the background color for inputs

input-placeholder-color.description: Configures the placeholder color for inputs

input-border-width.description:
Configures the border width for inputs
Used to compose $input-border

input-border-style.description:
Configures the border style for inputs
Used to compose $input-border

input-border-color.description:
Configures the border color for inputs
Used to compose $input-border

input-border.description:
Form input border (read-only)
Composed of the separate border properties: width, style, color

input-border-radius.description: Configures the border radius for inputs

input-padding-horizontal.description: Configures the horizontal padding for inputs

input-padding-vertical.description: Configures the vertical padding for inputs

input-padding.description:
Configures the padding for inputs
Composed of separate padding properties: input-padding-vertical and input-padding-horizontal

input-font-size.description: Configures the font size for inputs

input-font-weight.description: Configures the font weight for inputs

input-box-shadow.description:
Configures the shadow for inputs. Defaults to none
Use one of the $shadow variables to configure consistantly

input-focus-border-color.description: Configures the input:focus border color. Defaults to $focus-border-color

input-focus-border-width.description: Configures the input:focus border width. Defaults to $input-border-width

input-focus-border-style.description: Configures the input:focus border width. Defaults to $input-border-width

input-focus-border.description:
Form input:focus border (read-only)
Composed of the separate border properties: width, style and color

input-focus-box-shadow.description: Configures the input:focus shadow. Defaults to $focus-box-shadow

input-invalid-border-color.description: Configures the input:invalid border color. Defaults to $color-danger

input-invalid-border-width.description: Configures the input:invalid border width. Defaults to $input-border-width

input-invalid-border-style.description: Configures the input:invalid border style. Defaults to $input-border-style

input-invalid-border.description:
Form input:invalid border (read-only)
Composed of the separate border properties: width, style and color

input-focus-border-primary.description: Configures the width style color of the border on focus (experimental)

input-focus-outline-distance.description: Configures the distance(top bottom left right) of the border from the element on focus (experimental)

input-focus-dropdown-items-border-radius.description: Configures the border-radius of dropdown items on focus (experimental)

input-focus-outline-offset-distance.description:
Configures the position top bottom left right for focused components when outline is used to display focus
 @require {variable} $focus-outline-offset-distance

layout-vertical-nav-header-color.description: Configures the header-color for app vertical navigation

navigation-item-border-radius.description: Configures the border-radius for bb-navigation items

layout-vertical-nav-item-border-radius.description: Configures the border-radius for app vertical navigation items

page-layout-topbar-height.description: Configures the height of the page-layout-topbar

layout-topbar-height.description: Configures the height of the layout-topbar

pagination-padding-horizontal.description: Configures the horizontal padding for pagination

pagination-padding-vertical.description: Configures the vertical padding for pagination

pagination-disabled-background-color.description: Configures the pagination:disabled background-color. Defaults to $pagination-background-color

pagination-disabled-border-color.description: Configures the pagination:disabled border-color. Defaults to $pagination-disabled-color

pagination-active-border-color.description: Configures the pagination:active border-color. Defaults to $pagination-active-background-color

pagination-focus-border-primary.description: Configures the focus of the table  (experimental) Used to configure when table is focused

payment-card-color.description: Configures the color for the payment-card

payment-card-box-shadow.description: Configures the shadow for the payment-card

payment-card-border-radius.description: Configures the border-radius for the payment-card

payment-card-number-font-weight.description: Configures the font weight for the payment card number

payment-card-number-font-size.description: Configures the font size for the payment card number

payment-card-name-font-size.description: Configures the font size of the payment card name

payment-card-name-font-weight.description: Configures the font-weight of the payment card name

payment-card-label-font-size.description: Configures the font size of the payment-card experition label

payment-card-label-font-weight.description: Configures the font weight of the payment-card expiration label

payment-card-expiration-date-font-weight.description: Configures the font weight of the payment-card expiration date

payment-card-expiration-date-font-size.description: Configures the font size of the payment-card expiration date

payment-card-min-width.description: Configures the minimum width of the payment-card

payment-card-max-width.description: Configures the maximum width of the payment-card

payment-card-custom-background-map.description:
Configures a map of custom colors ([name]: [background value]), use existing keys to override the colors
To add new colors, keys can be added, but those need to be added in the html with corresponding class--modifiers as well

product-item-title-font-weight.description: Configures the font weight of the product-item title

product-item-title-font-size.description: Configures the font size of the product-item title

product-item-account-info-product-number.description: Configures the color of the product-item account-info product-number
Configures the font weight of the product-item account-info product-number
Configures the font size of the product-item account-info product-number

product-item-amount-color.description: Configures the color of the product-item amount

product-item-amount-font-weight.description: Configures the font weight of the product-item amount

product-item-amount-font-size.description: Configures the font-size of the product-item amount

product-item-owners-color.description: Configures the color of the product-item owners

search-box-border-radius.description: Configures the border-radius for the search box

search-box-box-shadow.description: Configures the boxshadow for the .bb-search-box. Defaults to $input-box-shadow

search-box-padding-horizontal.description: Configures the horizontal padding for the search box

search-box-button-padding-horizontal.description: Configures the horizontal padding for the search box button

search-box-border.description: Configures the border for search-box. Defaults to $input-border

search-box-button-color.description: Configures the color of the search-box buttons

search-box-button-background-color.description: Configures the background-color of the search box buttons

search-focus-outline-distance.description: Configures the distance(top bottom left right) of the border from the element on focus (experimental)

table-cell-padding-horizontal.description: Configures the default padding of table cells

table-cell-padding-vertical.description: Configures the default padding of table cells

table-heading-padding-horizontal.description: Configures the default horizontal padding of table headers

table-heading-padding-vertical.description: Configures the default vertical padding of table headers

table-font-size.description: Configures the font size for tables. Defaults to $font-size-table-default

focus-box-shadow-offset-x.description:
Configures the horizontal shadow position of focused components
Used to compose $focus-box-shadow

focus-box-shadow-offset-y.description:
Configures the vertical shadow position of focused components
Used to compose $focus-box-shadow

focus-box-shadow-blur-radius.description:
Configures the shadow blur radius for focused components
Used to compose $focus-box-shadow

focus-box-shadow-spread-radius.description:
Configures the shadow spread radius for focused components
Used to compose $focus-box-shadow

focus-box-shadow-color.description:
Configures the shadow color for focused components
Used to compose $focus-box-shadow

focus-box-shadow.description:
Focus state shadow (read-only)
Composed of the separate shadow properties: offset-x, offset-y, blur-radius, spread-radius and color

focus-border-color.description: Configures the border-color for focused components

focus-border-width-primary.description: Configures the border-color for focused components

focus-outline-distance.description: Configures the position top bottom left right for focused components when border is used

focus-outline-offset-distance.description: Configures the position top bottom left right for focused components when outline is used to display focus

heading-widget-background.description: Configures the background for the bb-heading-widget. Uses a linear gradient by default

heading-widget-color.description: Configures the color for the bb-heading-widget heading

button-bar-margin-y.description:
Sets the standard vertical margin value.
Extending from `$spacer-lg`

button-bar-button-sm-margin-x.description:
Sets the horizontal margin value (sm).
Extending from `$spacer-sm`

button-bar-button-sm-margin-y.description:
Sets the vertical margin value (sm).
Extending from `$spacer-md`

button-bar-button-md-margin-x.description:
Sets the horizontal margin value (md).
Extending from `$spacer-sm`

button-bar-button-md-margin-y.description:
Sets the vertical margin value (md).
Extending from `$spacer-md`

button-bar-left-button-sm-margin-x.description:
Sets the horizontal margin value (md) for the most left button.
Extending from `$spacer-sm`

button-bar-reverse-button-margin-x.description:
Sets the horizontal margin value for the reverse ordered button-bar.
Extending from `$spacer-sm`

button-bar-sticky-bg-color.description:
Sets the background color value for sticky button-bar.
Extending from `$background-color-neutral`

bb-card-shadow-level-sm.description:
Setting the level of shadow on the bb-card.
Replacing `-sm` with any of these modifiers changes the level of shadow:
`sm`, `md`, `lg`, `xl`.

bb-card-border-radius.description:
Setting the border styles of bb-card.
The border styles are split up in `radius`, `width` and `color`.

bb-card-background-color.description:
Setting the background colors of bb-card.
Besides the default, the background colors are organized in `highlight` and `warning`.

bb-card-header-padding-sm.description:
Setting the padding on bb-card-header.

Modifiers are available for small (`sm`) or medium (`md`) padding.
Also for applyinng padding when bb-card-header is the only child element in bb-card.

bb-card-header-focus-box-shadow.description:
Setting the box-shadow on bb-card-header.

Using this variable would set
Also for applyinng padding when bb-card-header is the only child element in bb-card.

bb-card-padding-vertical.description:
Set the padding values on bb-card, bb-card-body, bb-card-footer.

Different variables are available for setting padding to bb-card elements.

bb-card-color.description: Set the main color of the bb-card.

bb-card-caption-background-color.description: Set the caption color or background-color of bb-card.

bb-card-margin-title.description: Sets the size of margin for bb-card-title

bb-card-focus-border-primary.description: Set the style values when focus is active on bb-card

container-padding-x-lg.description: Setting the horizontal padding value for large (`lg`) size screens.

container-padding-y-lg.description: Setting the vertical padding value for large (`lg`) size screens.

container-padding-x-md.description: Setting the horizontal padding value for medium (`md`) size screens.

container-padding-x-sm.description: Setting the horizontal padding value for small (`sm`) size screens.

container-padding-y-md.description: Setting the vertical padding value for medium (`md`) size screens.

container-fixed-width-max-width.description:
Setting the maximum width of the container element.

Standard value is the default `$container-fixed-width-max-width`. For smaller screens you
can use `$container-fixed-width-small-max-width`.

highlight-background-color.description: Extending from the global color variable `$color-warning-lightest`.

positive-pay-user-info-xs-sizer.description: Configure the spacing of exception details user info card for extra small devices

positive-pay-amount-range-md-sizer.description: Configure the spacing for amount range filter field

positive-pay-list-spacing-md.description: Configure the spacing of view checks list for small devices

positive-pay-list-item-sizer-md.description: Configure the size of view checks list items

positive-pay-list-item-spacing-md.description: Configure the spacing of view checks list items

positive-pay-list-item-sizer-lg.description: Configure the size of view checks list items for large devices

positive-pay-list-item-focus-box-shadow.description: Configure the focus ring for the elements

card-border-width.description: Setting the default border width for 'card'.

form-focus-border-primary.description: Configures the width style color of the border on focus (experimental)

form-focus-outline-distance.description: Configures the distance(top bottom left right) of the border from the element on focus (experimental)

form-focus-box-shadow.description: Sets the box-shadow to none on focus (experimental)
